rows.label: tlk0001020_msg0001
rows.name:
You finally made it.
You're here to take over the watch, right?

rows.label: tlk0001020_msg0005
rows.name:
Finally, I can take a breather.
I need to have a drink and recharge.

rows.label: tlk0001020_msg0006
rows.name: The weather looks ominous, so keep a sharp lookout.

rows.label: tlk0001020_msg0007
rows.name:
And if anything unusual happens, call me.
A drunk will come running right away.

rows.label: tlk0001020_msg0008
rows.name:
Alright... Come back as soon as
you're ready.

rows.label: tlk0001020_msg0009
rows.name:
Or else the party will be over.
I'm counting on you, Rex.

rows.label: tlk0001020_msg0101
rows.name:
Rex, you came.
But it's still early for the shift change.

rows.label: tlk0001020_msg0102
rows.name:
Why don't you explore the Uzushio a bit more?
It's your first time on board, right?

rows.label: tlk0001020_msg0103
rows.name:
Also, have you spoken with the clients yet?
You're going to be working with them, so
you should get to know them a little.
